# crunchloop Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    crunchloop = {
      source = "registry.terraform.io/crunchloop/crunchloop"
    }
  }
}

provider "crunchloop" {
  url = "http://localhost:3000"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `url` (String) URL for the Crunchloop instance
